author: Cindy Tran
title: Brisbane Janetzki family lost both their children to cult | Daily Mail Online
text: How I lost my daughter and son to a cult: Mother reveals heartache after her cancer-suffering daughter left her family to follow a man named 'Paddy' Lloyd and Mary Janetzki lost both their children to a cult group led by 'Paddy' He accused Lloyd of being 'cursed' and their daughter's cancer was his fault Paddy convinced Renee to cut them off and follow him so she could be healed They never saw their son Ben again and only saw Renee on her deathbed Their distraught mother has opened up about how her family was torn apart Published: 13:58 GMT, 6 February 2017 | Updated: 13:58 GMT, 6 February 2017 318 shares
